response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a commodity; it represents a significant investment and a piece of history. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price, recognizing its true worth to you. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the balance between acknowledging its value to both of us while ensuring a fair transaction for me. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and we can proceed with the details of the sale.", "product_price": 1200000}
